data.name: 残神觉醒-BROKEN God Awakening
data.detailed_description:
Cultists in black robes prayed loudly under the moon, and indescribable horrors fell from the sky.
In the world that ordinary people cannot perceive, a huge storm that can destroy the world is brewing!
"If you don't want this city to be in ruins, let me stay here for one night."
Seeing the girl in black who forcibly broke into her house, Mikage Du couldn't understand the meaning of her words at this fashion.
-----------------------------
" BROKEN God Awakening" is a Galgame with a modern urban background. As the work that has invested the most energy in this group so far, it has:
More than a dozen main characters, each of which will have beautiful portraits and full voices! (Because some of the vertical paintings are still being adjusted, the rest of the characters will be gradually revealed on the store page in the future)
The length of the public line alone exceeds the single plot line of all the works in this group so far!
More options and endings!
The number of CG, background, and BGM is also the most sincere work in the history of this group!

All characters appearing in the game are of adult age, and the characters, stories, places, plots, worlds and other expressions involved are all fictional, and have nothing to do with any characters or events in reality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2DOU 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

content_descriptors.notes: Exposed clothing, Underwear, Sexy pose, Alcohol
